results.title: AMPK activation by metformin protects against pulmonary hypertension in rats and relaxes isolated human pulmonary artery.
results.text_hl: Our results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ protected against @DISEASE_Hypertension_Pulmonary @DISEASE_MESH:D006976 @@@PH@@@ progression in @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ where it reduced the mean pulmonary artery pressure, @DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary vascular remodeling@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@right ventricular hypertrophy@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ compared to vehicle-treated @CHEMICAL_Monocrotaline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016686 @@@MCT@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

citations.NLM: Abdelazeem H, Tu L, Thuillet R, Ottaviani M, Boulfrad A, Beck T, Senbel A, Mani S, Castier Y, Guyard A, Tran-Dinh A, El-Benna J, Longrois D, Silverstein AM, Guignabert C, Norel X. AMPK activation by metformin protects against pulmonary hypertension in rats and relaxes isolated human pulmonary artery. Eur J Pharmacol. 2023 May 5;946():175579. PMID: 36914083
citations.BibTeX: @article{36914083, title={AMPK activation by metformin protects against pulmonary hypertension in rats and relaxes isolated human pulmonary artery.}, author={Abdelazeem H and Tu L and Thuillet R and Ottaviani M and Boulfrad A and Beck T and Senbel A and Mani S and Castier Y and Guyard A and Tran-Dinh A and El-Benna J and Longrois D and Silverstein AM and Guignabert C and Norel X}, journal={Eur J Pharmacol}, volume={946}, pages={175579}}

results.title: Metformin Reverses Development of Pulmonary Hypertension via Aromatase Inhibition.
results.text_hl: We also investigated its influence on proliferation in @SPECIES_9606 @@@human@@@ pulmonary arterial smooth muscle cells. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reversed right ventricular systolic pressure, @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@right ventricular hypertrophy@@@, and decreased @DISEASE_Vascular_Remodeling @DISEASE_MESH:D066253 @@@pulmonary vascular remodeling@@@ in the @SPECIES_10116 @@@rat@@@.

citations.NLM: Dean A, Nilsen M, Loughlin L, Salt IP, MacLean MR. Metformin Reverses Development of Pulmonary Hypertension via Aromatase Inhibition. Hypertension. 2016 Aug;68(2):446-54. PMID: 27296990
citations.BibTeX: @article{27296990, title={Metformin Reverses Development of Pulmonary Hypertension via Aromatase Inhibition.}, author={Dean A and Nilsen M and Loughlin L and Salt IP and MacLean MR}, journal={Hypertension}, volume={68}, number={2}, pages={446-54}}

results.title: Adverse physiologic effects of Western diet on right ventricular structure and function: role of lipid accumulation and metabolic therapy
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ reduced RV systolic pressure, prevented @<m>DISEASE_Hypertrophy_Right_Ventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017380 @@@RV hypertrophy@@@, and reduced RV lipid accumulation in both unstressed stressed conditions.

citations.NLM: Brittain EL, Talati M, Fortune N, Agrawal V, Meoli DF, West J, Hemnes AR. Adverse physiologic effects of Western diet on right ventricular structure and function: role of lipid accumulation and metabolic therapy Pulm Circ. 2019 Jan-Mar;9(1):2045894018817741. PMID: 30451070
citations.BibTeX: @article{30451070, title={Adverse physiologic effects of Western diet on right ventricular structure and function: role of lipid accumulation and metabolic therapy}, author={Brittain EL and Talati M and Fortune N and Agrawal V and Meoli DF and West J and Hemnes AR}, journal={Pulm Circ}, volume={9}, number={1}, pages={2045894018817741}}

results.title: Activation of AMPK Prevents Monocrotaline-Induced Extracellular Matrix Remodeling of Pulmonary Artery

citations.NLM: Li S, Han D, Zhang Y, Xie X, Ke R, Zhu Y, Liu L, Song Y, Yang L, Li M. Activation of AMPK Prevents Monocrotaline-Induced Extracellular Matrix Remodeling of Pulmonary Artery Med Sci Monit Basic Res. 2016 Mar 9;22():27-33. PMID: 26978596
